griffon.javafx

Class AbstractJavaFXGriffonApplication

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.application.Application
      • griffon.javafx.AbstractJavaFXGriffonApplication
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GriffonApplication, Observable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    JavaFXGriffonApplication

    public abstract class AbstractJavaFXGriffonApplication
extends javafx.application.Application
implements GriffonApplication
    Base implementation of GriffonApplication that runs in applet mode.
    Since:
    2.0.0
    Author:
    Andres Almiray

      • getPropertyChangeListeners

        @Nonnull
public PropertyChangeListener[] getPropertyChangeListeners(@Nullable
                                                          String propertyName)
        Description copied from interface: Observable
        Returns an array of all the listeners which have been associated with the named property.
        Specified by:
        getPropertyChangeListeners in interface Observable
        Parameters:
        propertyName - The name of the property being listened to
        Returns:
        all of the PropertyChangeListeners associated with the named property. If no such listeners have been added, or if propertyName is null, an empty array is returned.
